title: Will the Hummer Electric pickup truck be a serious competition to the Tesla Cybertruck? - Quora

response.answer_text: It will not be a serious competition feature or spec wise. There will be few people buying it for the form factor and half of them might buy a Bollinger instead. You'll be looking at 200-250 miles range with these or a double battery size to compensate and at least +$50k to the price for that. It will be missing all the features available on a Tesla screen and self driving (short term — driving assist) features.
This isn’t a serious question is it? How the heck would anyone know how two trucks compare when neither one is in production? Get real, no one even know if they both will be produced.
